document_data.name: The Devoted Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Devoted Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Devoted''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: The Devoted and [[Exalted Mamluk Society|Exalted]] were bitter rivals, leading to frequent conflicts in the region of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]].
document_data.Organization: The Devoted were led by [[Amahl Abd al-Muhlis]], the Most Respected Warrior.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Devoted were scattered through the Cities of the Pantheon, but their strongest presence was within [[I'tiraf]] and [[Fahhas]].
